data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (cpu_usage IS NULL OR cpu_usage < 85) AND (failed_jobs IS NULL OR failed_jobs < 1) AND (lock_timeouts_rate IS NULL OR lock_timeouts_rate < 1) AND (number_of_unhealthy_cluster_nodes IS NULL OR number_of_unhealthy_cluster_nodes < 1) AND (wait_time_rate IS NULL OR wait_time_rate < 1000)) AS 'Health Score' FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance FACET microsoft_sqlserver_instance_name
SELECT uniqueCount(microsoft_sqlserver_instance_name) AS 'Instances' FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance FACET cluster_status

presentation.title: Cluster Status Distribution
presentation.notes: The worst status across all nodes in the cluster.

data.nrql: SELECT average(cpu_usage) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: CPU Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The CPU Usage of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(memory_usage) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Memory Usage (Percent)
presentation.notes: The percentage of memory that is being utilized by SQL Server.

data.nrql: SELECT average(iops_rate) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: IOPS (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: Total amount of disk write and read operations.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_query_cpu_time) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Query CPU Time (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The Average Query CPU Time of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_wait_time) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Wait Time (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The Average Wait Time of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(average_query_executions) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Average Query Executions
presentation.notes: The Average Query Executions of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(lock_wait_time) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Lock Wait Time (Milliseconds)
presentation.notes: The Lock Wait Time of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(dead_locked_queries) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Dead Locked Queries
presentation.notes: The Dead Locked Queries of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(lock_timeouts_rate) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Lock Timeouts (per Second)
presentation.notes: The Lock Timeouts of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(number_of_unhealthy_cluster_nodes) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Number of Unhealthy Cluster Nodes
presentation.notes: The number of nodes in a cluster in a down, paused, or unknown state.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(failed_jobs) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Failed Jobs
presentation.notes: The Failed Jobs of the Instance.

data.nrql: SELECT average(buffer_cache_hit_ratio) FROM microsoft_sqlserver_instance COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Buffer Cache Hit Ratio
presentation.notes: The Buffer Cache Hit Ratio of the Instance.

presentation.notes: The Buffer Pool Hit Ratio of the Instance.

presentation.notes: The Log Cache Hit Ratio of the Instance.
